CustomField.formula: IF( AND( ISBLANK( UserGem__CurrentContact__r.LastActivityDate ), ISBLANK( UserGem__CurrentLead__r.LastActivityDate ) ), NULL, DATE(1900, 01, 01) + MAX( BLANKVALUE(UserGem__CurrentContact__r.LastActivityDate, DATE(1900, 01, 01)) - DATE(1900, 01, 01), BLANKVALUE(UserGem__CurrentContact__r.LastActivityDate, DATE(1900, 01, 01)) - DATE(1900, 01, 01) ) )
CustomField.label: LastActivity
